name: playwright-network-metrics
description: Playwright instrumentation to collect and aggregate network performance metrics across test runs.

scripts.build: bun run build:js && bun run build:types
scripts.build:js: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm --packages=external --external:@playwright/test --external:playwright --sourcemap --entry-naming index.mjs && bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format cjs --packages=external --external:@playwright/test --external:playwright --sourcemap --entry-naming index.cjs
